data.text: @ClemsTiger828 Marie would lay against me as well when she was cold so i feel guilty and I can't handle heat from any person or animal long as in like more than min. Lol.
@legman100 Oh goodness. I have one that sleeps up against my back while I sleep. I sometimes just have to push him off the bed. He’s annoying too. I know, I’m mean. Lol

@ClemsTiger828 She is little pain. She likes to bring me a toy to play fetch with right after I turn off the lights to go to sleep. Usually on the days I get to bed late. She will meow at me if I ignore her and come to my ear to do as well as place her paws on my or get on my side. Lol

@ClemsTiger828 Yep my over snuggler. Misty my 6 yr old is my anti snuggler. She graced me with her presence last night wondering why I wasn't upstairs feeding her and giving her treats. Lol. https://t.co/x0VT398m75

@kriSTeenagRAY1 Yeah I would tease daughter about leaving charging cords out and I know she cost me over 1k on cords. My daughter wasn't a fan of her so she wouldn't let her in room so she just left cords out when she went to bathroom always forgetting Marie on needed few seconds to chew through

@legman100 My girl was a chomper too. I still have her stuff all over the house cuz she'll never be gone. I talk to her and my baby before her too. I have her sister still so it helps a lot. All my charger cords and laptop cords are chewed but im not parting with them. Makes me smile
